message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is closer to its true value.  Could you meet me at $12,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.
